Title: Relates to prohibiting certain suicide prevention and mental health services hotlines from being automated
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the office of mental health to promulgate rules and regulations prohibiting any suicide prevention or mental health services hotline operated or sponsored by the state from being automated.
LawCode: Amd ยง7.09, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to prohibiting certain suicide prevention and mental health services hotlines from being automated
